channel.title: How Do People Hack Myspaces?
channel.description: well im just wondering how people hack other peoples myspaces?

item.title: How Do People Hack Myspaces?
item.dc:creator: @mrrules mrrules
item.description:
@mrrules wrote:

[quote=“therealjdb, post:57, topic:59671”][quote author=rifflord link=topic=85640.msg1676387#msg1676387 date=1187184006]
Regular keylogger viruses, or online phishers…[br][size=1]Posted on: August 15, 2007, 02:18:24 AM[/size][hr]They generaly use phishers.
but some links lead to downloading of keylogger viruses.
The phisher is the most common way.
[/quote]
Thank you for restating everything posted thus far, I think I finally understand it now. [/sarcasm]

EDIT: Sorry, I’m being a bit hostile, I’ve had a very, very long night and I’m in a very bad mood.[/quote]
Lol not to be mean but you use to be a dick… Now for some reason your nice. I prob just caught you at bad times haha.

Read full topic

item.title: How Do People Hack Myspaces?
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

mjordan:

I’m now wanting to know about cookie stealing…

The XSS “Myspace Worm” was fixed a while ago and I don’t think I’ve heard of any other cookie stealing methods that still work. If you’d like to read up on the worm here is a link on how it was done. link

If you’re still interested in phishing as well here is a pretty decent looking phisher Download

I’m now wanting to know about cookie stealing…

item.title: How Do People Hack Myspaces?
item.dc:creator: @mrrules mrrules
item.description:
@mrrules wrote:

If you want to hack someone myspace best way would be phsing it. First you have to make a login page then get a ftp host. Best way to trick them is make a fake youtube vid and post in there comments and they will try and watch it , but when they click it actually logs them out and takes them to you page you made. Then if there stupid anuff they will log in. Another way is keylogging or cookie stealing.

Read full topic
